family.name: Silent Running w/ Torque Compensation
family.comment: These are the version 3.5 decoders released after September 2003, 3.6 released July 2007

model.comment: for Atlas N-Scale GP40-2, U25B, U23B, B23-7, 30-7, 36-7, GP38, SD25, Trainmaster & many others
for Atlas N-Scale SD50, SD60M, SD60
for Atlas N-Scale GP30, GP35, GP7, GP9
for Kato N-Scale PA1, E8, Genesis P42, etc.
for Kato N-Scale F3 A&B, F7 A&B and others
for Kato RS2,RSC2,SD80MAC,SD90MAC, LL RS2, Wal GP18,RS2

variable.tooltip: Time the decoder will wait before braking to a stop after running into a section of track with DC power
variable.label: Packet Time-out Value (0=Don't Brake)

variable.item: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
variable.label: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward

variable.item: Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse
variable.label: Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse

variable.tooltip: 14 Speed Step Mode not supported in this decoder
variable.label: Speed Step
Pas de vitesse
Fahrstufen
Step Velocità

variable.tooltip: Adjustment amount used to equalize the speed in each direction
variable.label: Reverse Trim Adjustment

variable.tooltip: Determines whether to add the adjustment amount to the forward or reverse direction
variable.label: Reverse Trim Sign

variable.tooltip: How frequently the motor is kicked with voltage pulses
variable.label: Torque Kick Rate

variable.tooltip: How much voltage is used to kick the motor at low speeds
variable.label: Torque Kick Strength

variable.tooltip: Value in 1/4 second increments after F2 goes off
variable.label: Ditch light hold time

label.text: Tip: you must set CV15 equal to this number to unlock the decoder for programming
Multi-decoder control in the tools menu will set CV15 as needed.
